name: Silversmith
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the metallic scent of silver and the sound of hammers striking precious metal and the rhythmic work of fine metal crafting. The air carries the promise of luxury and the essential nature of precious metalwork, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of skilled craftsmanship and the importance of creating beautiful, valuable objects from precious materials.
